title: MONT MARTE Extra Soft Oil Pastels 52pc, Assorted Bright Colours, Vibrant and Buttery, Versatile Art Pastels for Blending, Layering & Shading, Ideal for Art, Craft, Colouring and Sketching
features: Includes 52 vibrant oil pastels: White (x 4), Lemon Yellow, Yellow, Cadmium Yellow, Naples Yellow, Yellow Ochre, Salmon, Apricot, Tangerine, Orange, Vermilion, Crimson, Scarlet, Madder Red, Burgundy, Fuchsia, Pink, Light Purple, Purple, Violet, Indigo Purple, Prussian Blue, Ultramarine Blue, Royal Blue, Turquoise Blue, Dusty Teal, Sky Blue, Aqua Blue, Mint, Turquoise Green, Viridian, Phthalo Green, Emerald Green, Green, Chartreuse, Terra Verde, Khaki, Olive Green, Dark Olive, Sepia, Van Dyke Brown, Burnt Sienna, Red Oxide, Taupe, Light Grey, Grey, Dark Grey, Black
Ultra-soft, buttery texture is exceptional for blending and clean colour mixes. Create textural effects by mixing pastels with a palette knife
Suitable for a range of surfaces including paper, card and canvas
Each oil-based pastel is non toxic and wrapped in paper to help keep your hands clean
Create sgraffito effects, or glazes by applying oil mediums or turpentine with a brush
description: Create bold and vibrant artwork with our Extra Soft Oil Pastels 52pc. Inside the set are 48 vibrant oil pastel colours with four additional white pastels for creating extra highlights, blends and colour combinations. The ultra-soft buttery texture gives you exceptional blending and clean colour mixing. Thanks to the highly blendable formula, they’re easy to work with a palette knife to achieve textural effects. Use this art pastel set on a range of smooth or textured surfaces, including paper, card and canvas. Experiment and create interesting designs, patterns and techniques. Try mixing them with oil mediums or turpentine for a wet, glossy effect. Handy hints: Blend colours with pastel blenders, paper stump or brush
